headline: A Look at Interactive Brokers (IBKR) Valuation Following Karta Visa Card Launch and Expanded Cash Management Offerings
summary: Interactive Brokers Group (IBKR) just launched its Karta Visa card for eligible clients, marking a real step up in cash management services. The card enables global purchases, has no foreign transaction fees, and offers several lifestyle perks. See our latest analysis for Interactive Brokers Group. Interactive Brokers has kept up the momentum this year, launching new products like the Karta Visa card following strong quarterly earnings and a fresh dividend announcement. The company’s recent...
